lyricsJpn: 渇[かわ]いた心[こころ]で駆[か]け抜[ぬ]ける

on the lonely rail
私[わたし]ついていくよ

きっとあなたは輝[かがや]いて

会[あ]いたい気持[きも]ちに理由[りゆう]はない
あなたへあふれだす Lovin'you

描[えが]きながら 追[お]いかけよう
for your lonely heart

lyricsEng: Running through with a thirsty heart
I'm sorry I couldn't do anything
Even sharing the pain
You won't let me
To live in innocence and not look back
Turn your back and walk away
on the lonely rail
I'll follow you
Even in the darkness of any painful world
I'm sure you'll shine
The end of the future beyond
Don't let weakness destroy your soul
you converge with my way
Now God bless us...
The feelings that reach and heat up
Reality melts and wanders
There is no reason to miss you
I'm pourmy feelings into you, lovin'you
At least I can only dream beautiful dreams
I'll chase after you while drawing
for your lonely heart
Stop lying, it's not like you
Look me in the eye and let's talk about the future
I'm ready
Even the darkest future
Maybe we can be strong and change our destiny
Though I want my wish to be granted
God knows everything...
With you, with me
The others have vanished
While painting the beauty of a faint dream
Trace the scars
So I'll follow you
Even in the darkness of any painful world
I'm sure you'll shine
The end of the future beyond
Don't let weakness destroy your soul
you converge with my way
Now God bless us...
